name: Atlantis Sky Patrol
description: This frenetic marble-popping adventure puts you in charge of how fast each level will end. Knock out doomsday devices on each of the 100 levels in the game by matching marble colors in sets of three. To finish off the device and move on to the next round, simply destroy the cleverly-placed static orbs that continually allow additional...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000/XP/VistaProcessor: 600 MhzMemory: 128 MBGraphics: On-board graphicsDirectX®: 6.0 or higherHard Drive: 51 MB
